title: S&P 500 Movers: CHD, IPGP - Nasdaq.com
text: In early trading on Thursday, shares of IPG Photonics topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 7.9%. Year to date, IPG Photonics registers a 18.8% gain.    makeArticleAd();  And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Church & Dwight, trading down 3.0%. Church & Dwight is showing a gain of 18.3% looking at the year to date performance.      Two other components making moves today are Newmont Goldcorp, trading down 2.9%, and Copart, trading up 5.3% on the day.        VIDEO: S&P 500 Movers: CHD, IPGP
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
